rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: changes reading schedule frequently; doesn't announce paper topics early enough for students to manage time needed for assignments. repeats examples from readings; doesn't present other ways to comprehend material. provides unclear guidance on assignments. very confusing, very disappointing. not recommended for non-philosophy majors.
AMAZING professor. Best professor at UNC. Clear, undertanding and simply awesome! you will be lucky if you have her as a professor
adore her! ADORE her. she's helpful, fabulous, funny, interesting, clear, everything you want in a teacher. take her! love her!
I thought she was awesome. Definitely recommend taking her class.
awesome class, awesome teacher!  exams are really straight-forward, if you know the material you'll get an A.  i highly recommend it!!
NOT HELPFUL AT ALL... SPENT CLASS TALKIN @ HOMER SIMPSON... GRADED TOO HARD .. DIDNT EXPLAIN MATERIAL AT ALL!!!!!!!!!!
nice, clarifies lots of information, grades pretty hard as requested by the head teacher
